long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Master is a dynamic Chrome extension engineered to enhance your browsing experience by enforcing a limit on the number of open tabs and providing valuable insights into the Chrome upgrade process.
